DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study assess regional cerebral oxygen saturation cardiac output non-invasively patient subarachnoid hemorrhage nimodipine administration prevention/management cerebral vasospasm .
DOC.brief_title: Noninvasive Assessment Cerebral Oxygenation Cardiac Function Patients With Neurovascular Diseases
DOC.criteria: aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage potential actual cerebral vasospasm nonaneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage outside 421 day window ictus peripheral deoxygenation contraindication nimodipine administration
